# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new vector from the given vector of integers.

## Declaration

```swift
init<Other>(_ other: SIMD4<Other>) where Other : FixedWidthInteger, Other : SIMDScalar
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The vector to convert.
title: init(_:)
